question: I’m preparing my Japanese visa application and need to find a photo that meets the official visa requirements. Could you help me locate the file?

question: Can I use my watch to remotely control my phone for taking photos or playing music?
answer:
Yes, absolutely. According to the watch manual, as long as the watch is connected to your phone, you can do the following:
1. Remote shutter: Open the “Remote Camera” app from the watch’s app list, and your phone’s camera will launch automatically. You can then tap the shutter icon on your watch screen to take a photo.
2. Music control: When your phone is playing music, open the “Music” app on the watch to pause, play, or skip to the previous/next track directly from the watch.

The document is stored in Personal Form/NTU Auditorium application form .pdf.

file_path: Paper/China-Africa Relations_ From Solidarity to Strategy.pptx
question: In my thesis materials, where did I bring up China’s peacekeeping in Mali?
answer: References to China's deployment of combat troops to Mali can be found across your presentation, final thesis, and draft. In the presentation China-Africa Relations_ From Solidarity to Strategy.pptx, slide 23 titled "UN Peacekeeping: First Combat Troops to Mali" explicitly states, "Deployment to Mali – In 2013, China deployed combat troops to Mali for the first time…" In the final thesis Final_Submitted_How China-Africa Relations Have Developed.pdf, page 44 under the section "UN Peacekeeping Operations" records, "In June 2013, China agreed to commit 395 peacekeeping troops to Mali. The most notable aspect of this decision was that combat troops would be sent as part of the contingent, marking the first time China has sent combat troops on a peacekeeping mission. Similarly, in the draft Thesis Draft.docx, Chapter 4 "Security and Diplomatic Engagement", section 4.2 "China's Evolving Role in UN Peacekeeping in Africa" notes, "A major milestone was reached in June 2013, when China agreed to commit combat troops to a peacekeeping mission for the first time, as part of the UN contingent in Mali."

question: What is the function of "Master AI"?
answer: Master AI (AI Photography) is a pre-installed camera feature that can intelligently recognize objects and scenes (such as food, beaches, or blue skies) and automatically optimize color and brightness settings to help you take better photos.

question: I remember seeing an illustration in a book about a kidnapping scene. What custom does it describe?

question: How is delta knowledge calculated? What is the formula? What does this metric represent?
answer: Δ_knowledge = \frac{Acc_{post} - Acc_{pre}}{100\% - Acc_{pre}} \times 100\% \quad \text{where } Acc_{pre} \text{ and } Acc_{post} \text{ represent the accuracy before and after watching the video, respectively. The ∆knowledge metric represents the normalized performance improvement in the Adaptation track after watching a video, as defined on page 7.}

question: Who was assassinated in the February 26 Incident, and can you find a photo of him?

The caption reads: "Admiral Viscount Saito, assassinated in the February 26 Incident, and his granddaughter."

question: What type of fire alarm system does my rented apartment require?
answer: Your rented apartment requires both automatic and manual fire alarm systems. According to the Code of Practice for Fire Precautions in Buildings 2023 (policy/CODE_OF_PRACTICE_FOR_FIRE_PRECAUTIONS_IN_BUILDINGS_2023.pdf), Amendment History – Chapter 6, page 204, Table 6.3A (Provision of Fire Alarms), under the row “PG III to VIII (With stay-in facilities)” and the column “Building of more than one storey”, the requirement is listed as “Automatic + manual.” Since your rental application (Personal Form/Rental application form 2.pdf) shows that your unit is on the 11th floor, both types of fire alarm systems are mandatory.

question: My internship at Grant Thornton has officially ended, but I still have unfinished tasks. Until when is the latest I can continue working at the company?
answer: You can work until August 11, 2025. According to your Grant Thornton Internship Application Form (Personal Form/internship-application-form_fillable.pdf), your official internship period was from January 6, 2025, to July 1, 2025. Based on the NTU academic calendar (ntu-academic-calendar-ay2025-26-(semester)f9349663-021d-4e97-a03c-df8ba49a08ec.pdf), August 11, 2025, is the official start of teaching. In addition, your Personal Form/Short Leave Application.pdf only covers leave until July 1, 2025. Therefore, the latest you may continue working at the company is August 11, 2025, by which time you must return to NTU for the start of classes.

question: Will the time off I applied for be enough for the internship?
answer: Yes, it does. According to your Grant Thornton Internship Application Form (Personal Form/internship-application-form_fillable.pdf), your official internship period is from January 6, 2025, to July 1, 2025. The leave of absence you applied for runs from December 1, 2024, to July 1, 2025, which fully covers the entire internship period.

question: What is the employment rate at NTU?
answer: According to policy/NTU Annual Report 2024.pdf, the 2023 employment rate was 90%. This means that 9 out of every 10 graduates from the Class of 2023 found a job within four months of graduation.

question: What is the maximum size of a storeroom with partitions that does not require approval?
answer: According to MINOR ALTERATIONS OR ADDITIONS NOT REQUIRING APPROVAL OF PLANS (policy/fire-safety-(building-and-pipeline-fire-safety)-regulation-4(4).pdf, page 1, 1.(a)), partition works arising from change of use to ancillary usage as a pantry, toilet, or storeroom of not more than 20 square metres do not require approval. Therefore, the storeroom must not exceed 20 square metres in size.

answer: The study on China’s media influence in Africa chose Nairobi as the case study.

question: My left foot touched the baseline before hitting the ball. What is this action called, and what happens in an official match?
answer: This action is called a Foot Fault. In an official match, it is ruled as a Service Fault. According to Introduction to Tennis for Adults (introduction_to_tennis_for_adults.pdf), a server’s foot must not touch or cross the baseline before striking the ball. The 2025 ITF Rules of Tennis (2025-rules-of-tennis-english.pdf) further clarify this: Rule 18 defines a foot touching the baseline during the service motion as a Foot Fault, and Rule 19(a) specifies that a violation of Rule 18 results in a Service Fault.

question: When do the new household shelter regulations take effect?
answer: According to the Technical Requirements for Household Shelters 2023 (policy/circular-technical-requirements-for-household-shelters-2023.pdf), page 2, paragraph 3, the new regulations took effect on 1 October 2023.

question: In that study on Chinese Buddhism in Africa, which Beijing temple is affiliated with the monasteries in Botswana and Tanzania?
answer: The temple is Longquan Monastery located in Beijing.

question: Find the page numbers of problems related to mass.

question: Someone in our building keeps mischievously triggering the fire alarm. Is this illegal, and what are the penalties?
answer: Yes, this is illegal. According to the Statutes of the Republic of Singapore – Fire Safety Act 1993 (page 38, Section 25.-(1)): “Any person who knowingly gives or causes to be given a false alarm of fire to the Force or to the police shall be guilty of an offence and shall be liable on conviction to a fine not exceeding $5,000 or to imprisonment for a term not exceeding 3 months or to both.” Therefore, deliberately raising a false fire alarm is a criminal offence, punishable by a fine of up to SGD 5,000, imprisonment for up to 3 months, or both.

question: Can Jack Draper earn ATP ranking points from this result?
answer: No, he cannot. The US Open draw (2025_MS_draw.pdf) shows that Jack Draper won his first-round match by walkover. At the 2025 US Open, Draper advanced because his opponent withdrew. However, according to the 2025 ITF World Tennis Tour Regulations (2025-wtt-regulations.pdf), a player who advances from the first round by walkover is not awarded ranking points.

question: If I am hospitalized due to illness, which insurance plan should I use for claims?
answer: You may apply under either the Group Hospitalisation and Surgical Insurance or the Group Personal Accident Insurance, since you are both a Singapore Permanent Resident and a full-time NTU graduate student.

question: I am trying to transfer files from my Huawei Nova Y70 phone to my MacBook Air, but it doesn’t work. Could you explain why?
answer: This is because the two devices do not support direct wireless file transfer without third-party applications. The reasons are as follows:\n1. According to the HUAWEI nova Y70 User Guide.pdf (pp. 21–24), Huawei's "Multi-Device Collaboration" (also called Device+) is designed for use within the Huawei ecosystem (e.g., Huawei phones, tablets, Vision smart screens).\n2. According to the MacBook Air (2008) User Manual.pdf (pp. 15–16), its built-in wireless sharing functions mainly rely on AirPort (Wi-Fi) to share DVDs/CDs or migrate data between Macs or Windows computers, but it does not support direct collaboration protocols with Android systems.

question: Where is the Ferry Building located?
answer: According to san-francisco-11-contents.pdf, page 20 (Map Key p300, Map p301) in the section “THE FINANCIAL DISTRICT (FIDI),” the Ferry Building is located on the eastern edge of the Financial District. It sits along the waterfront boulevard called The Embarcadero, directly at the end of Market Street. The building is next to Pier 1 and Pier 1/2, and it also serves as a terminal for Golden Gate Transit Ferries and the Vallejo Ferry. Nearby, you will also find the California Street Cable Car Turnaround.
